selectCamerasHint: Select which cameras appear in the viewer panel:
noCamerasConfigured:
No cameras configured.
Go to Settings to add your Frigate server
and select cameras.
authFailed: Authentication failed (401). Check your username and password. Note: Frigate's native JWT auth (port 8971) is not supported — use port 5000 or a reverse proxy with Basic Auth.
cannotReachServer: Cannot reach server. Check the URL and ensure Frigate is running.
frigateOffline:
Frigate is offline.
Check that the server is running
and the URL is correct in Settings.
